Remdesivir is an adenosine analogue developed to treat Ebola. Its effects derive from inhibition of viral replication and RNA synthesis.

11 models. In vitro studies with SARS-CoV-2 measured a half-maximal effective concentration (EC 50) of 0.77 μM and inhibition of infection in Huh-7 cells.
